metadata.categorization_basis: CSPM overlap analysis - exclude config sources, include vulnerability intelligence

status_meaning.working: URL is accessible and returns data (HTTP 200)
status_meaning.not_tested: URL not yet tested for accessibility
status_meaning.error: URL accessible but has connectivity/timeout issues
status_meaning.csmp_covered: Excluded - Configuration security covered by existing CSMP tools
